mdRecord.dcterms:description: One of four mansions built on the north side of Ivy Road for local businessman Hollis Rinehart Sr. The structure passed through multiple hands throughout its history. From 1965 until 2004 the house served as the Kappa Sigma National Headquarters but due to legal matters the structure was abandoned by the organization. Now the centerpiece of the Kenridge housing development. [work]
